text: <!channel>: would love a quick stand-up update here, please! how's it going?
I have done the new permissions screen for camera access, wrapping up photos access right now, and will do microphone access next.
I will likely try to solve my filter-able stickers bug tonight so that I can start iPad testing tomorrow.
I'm still elbow-deep in view hierarchy/render pipeline. I hope to have it wrapped by EOD. I still have magic numbers and the variant picker UI after that.
I still feel OK about shipping on Friday
currently making a list of stuff for VQA from the latest build.

I just experienced what I can only call a cloudburst with the view hierarchy stuff. Finally feel ready to move on to magic numbers! There are probably minor quirks left over, but I'll catch them as I go through magic numbers and VQA

Magic numbers for old title cards and interstitials are done and pushed. First thing tomorrow I'll pick a new thing out of the pile (new TC/I magic numbers, fixing an interstitial render bug, fixing magic numbers for the Frame editor, UI for variant-picker). Also note I'll be WFH tomorrow.
